Create or edit an event set

1 On the Workstation menu, click Event Sets and Macros.

2 Click New, and enter a name for the event set.

Or, select an event set to edit from the Available Event Sets box.

3 In the Type box, select an event type. Then select one or more events in the Available Events box and click >>.

4 Use the Move arrows to move a highlighted event in the Selected Events box to a new position. Events will be listed in this order in the Events Library.

5 Click Save.

6 When you are finished creating event sets and event macros, click Close.
